Modern Apprenticeship
  • Home
  • About
  • Contact

Apprenticeships fill the gaps in formal education that are specific to a craft. Our education crisis can benefit from apprenticeships that provide easier access to education, while teaching individuals to their aptitude. Emphasizing hands-on experience curated by a working professional, apprenticeships provide the best introduction to your personal path to mastery in a craft.
